OOC: Sorry, but the modern day image of Christian is
becomming we don't like to step on toes and offend
people, the fact is Jesus was non-violent unless
someone directly attacked God, I feel God is directly
attackedby Witchcraft, and I wasn't going to shy away
from publically defending him.

--- warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@...> wrote:
> I didn't think we'd have to do this, but here it
> goes.
> 
> Sarah, it's a good thing you apologized, but please,
> don't take it 
> personnal when people insult you here. They don't
> really know you, so 
> why would they make it personnal? The only thing
> anyone around here 
> can complain about is the posts you send.
> Also, you should know that Rauq, Rudra and I are the
> three council 
> members. We are here to enforce the rules and help
> people (even if 
> some think otherwise). When there is a problem case,
> we get forced to 
> moderate someone, and this means no posting for some
> time.
> Rauq did send you a link to yahoogroups, but please
> also check 
> www.nbwrpg.com to check out the rules. If anything
> else, it'll help 
> you to role-play even better.
> 
> For everyone, please remember that this is a
> transformer rpg, not a 
> religious forum. I believe in my own way, but I
> respect what others 
> believe. The point is that not everyone would like
> to hear about it.
> And please, if you have to tell something to
> someone, do so by private 
> email, even if it takes longer.
> 
> Thanks.
> 
>
